title: Product and Service Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CITB (Peterborough, England) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: 5 Competancy based questions over a teams call. Interview was difficult as the questions needed very specific examples which were hard to think of on the spot.  Interviewers were nice, however they said I would hear from them the week after. I didn't hear anything so waited 2 weeks before chasing. It took them 3 weeks to contact me by email.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you had to choose between two options

title: Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CITB (King's Lynn, England) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Competencies based interview for the first round, the second round consisted of a micro teach. Panel of Two. Based over two days. Plenty of time offered to prepare for the interviews. Not long winded.
Interview Questions: Can you tell us about a Past experience where you worked as part of a team

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CITB
Interview Descriptions:
Nice & comfortable experience. Good atmosphere in the office, friendly welcome. 
Received a lot of paperwork to read. Online portal easy to use however no notifications of when something is uploaded so had to keep checking. Start time for first day given was between 08:30 and 09:00 which panicked me as to when to get there
Interview Questions: a time when you had to prioritise between two equally important tasks

title: Special Events Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CITB (Peterborough, England) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Interview process prior to actual interview and during was fine, red flag raised when after my interview the internal recruiter who booked my time slot called to ask how I wanted to do my presentation, NEVER to this day heard back about my interview, not a generic thanks but no thanks, even after chasing multiple times - this has really put me off CITB which is a shame as for the role offering it would have been quite an exciting one
Interview Questions: Asked me to do a presentation

title: Apprenticeship Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CITB in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, received email next working day. Interview was held 50 miles from london and expenses not reimbursed. Took the whole day to get there and back.  interviewed a month later by 2 friendly interviewers and told the outcome within a week.
Interview Questions: Describe a time where you faced a challenging situation.

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CITB (Great Bircham, England) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Competency based Interview
Online assessments
Interview panel consisted of 2 current Executive Assistants, they didn't seem like they'd interviewed before.
Asked for feedback and was told the person giving feedback was off, never heard anything else.
Interview Questions: Can you tell us about a time you have had to deal with a difficult person?

title: Business Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at CITB (London, England) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: It went really well and the interviewers were nice and patient. It was really more of a chat and discussions about the project and funding . We also had a video call with the Project sponsor which helped to put things into perspective
Interview Questions: How would you manage difficult stakeholders?

title: Apprenticeships Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CITB (London, England)
Interview Descriptions: Fill in application online, get invited to an interview and do a presentation. Lots of interview questions and panel take notes of all your answers. There were two people interviewing me
Interview Questions: How do you overcome difficulties in the way of your end goal?

title: Human Resources Business Partner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at CITB (Enderby, England)
Interview Descriptions:
The interview consisted of a 15 minute presentation followed by competency based questions and in total lasted about an hour.

I attended for interview some 2 months ago at end of August and was advised that I would be being invited for second interview and that the date would be confirmed in due course. I had infrequent  intermittent contact from the hiring manager following first interview and needed to chase a date for second interview. I was advised the delay was owing to difficulties with co-ordination of managment diaries. After waiting circa 2 months, I was advised that the role had been withdrawn and was no longer being recruited for owing to changes within the business. I appreciate that business circumstances do change sometimes at quite short notice however I feel that improved and more frank and honest communications would have provided a better candidate experience. This was particularly disappointing given the time and effort expended in preparing for the interview and devising a suitable presentation.
Interview Questions:
What was your greatest achievement?

Give me an example of a time when...

title: Customer Co-orsinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CITB
Interview Descriptions: application followed by competency based interview with two managers of the department. took roughly 30 to 45 minutes depending on how long the answers are. It was friendly but professional. Best to prepare with lots of examples as all questions are based on previous situations.
Interview Questions: tell me about a time you have had to deal with a difficult customer?

title: PR Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CITB (London, England) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Competency tests that were not clear to  me. The numeric test did not have much relevance to the role and was extremely difficult even though I have a science degree

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CITB (Bircham Newton, England) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions:
- Some fairly challenging competency based questions 
- Quite relaxed and easy going interviewers though
- You can always revisit questions if you are stuck, or bring in notes as a prompt
Interview Questions: Give an example of where you have delivered excellent customer service

title: Interim Assistant Fund Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at CITB (London, England) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interview based on experience and ability to fulfill the requirements of the contract specification, referred by recruitment agency Reed Global Finance, telephone interview based on review of skills and experience relevant to the role. Fast turnaround from being headhunted, to being shortlisted, being interviewed and then recruited - was in post within 3 working days! A great result.
Interview Questions: None of the questions were difficult, they were also based on my experience, and related to the contract remit, secured the position based on suitability.
